Sentencas: This paper describes an optimization strategy for operating solid-oxide fuel-cell systems at optimal efficiency.
Titulo: Enforcing optimal operation in solid-oxide fuel-cell systems

Sentencas: Specifically, we present the experimental validation of a real-time optimization (RTO) strategy applied to a commercial solid-oxide fuel-cell system.
Titulo: Enforcing optimal operation in solid-oxide fuel-cell systems

Sentencas: The proposed RTO scheme effectively pushes the system to higher levels of efficiency and maintains the system there despite perturbations by tracking active constraints.
Titulo: Enforcing optimal operation in solid-oxide fuel-cell systems

Sentencas: The optimization approach uses either steady-state measurements, or transient measurements in combination with a dynamic model, and can deal effectively with plant-model mismatch.
Titulo: Enforcing optimal operation in solid-oxide fuel-cell systems

Sentencas: In the reported experiments, the approach drives the system to the desired power demand at optimal efficiency.
Titulo: Enforcing optimal operation in solid-oxide fuel-cell systems

Sentencas: The experimental fuel-cell system reached 65% DC electrical efficiency.
Titulo: Enforcing optimal operation in solid-oxide fuel-cell systems

Sentencas: As such, the proposed RTO scheme is a promising candidate for enforcing optimal micro-CHP operation.
Titulo: Enforcing optimal operation in solid-oxide fuel-cell systems

Sentencas: In addition, the approach can deal with slow drifts such as degradation without compromising on efficiency.
Titulo: Enforcing optimal operation in solid-oxide fuel-cell systems

Sentencas: Finally, and important from a practical point of view, we suggest guidelines for safe and optimal operation.
Titulo: Enforcing optimal operation in solid-oxide fuel-cell systems
